comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- The man on the left is not "Hog." In another photo, he is identified as "Capt. Hoge" -- although you have mis-titled that photo with the name "Hodge."

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Wystan--Thank you for giving us the correct spelling of "Hoge". We will update the descriptive information for these images.
